DOC.brief_summary: Amniotomy ( break bag water ) commonly use induction labor . However , time highly variable . The purpose study determine first time mother undergo induction labor Foley catheter experience decrease labor time undergo early amniotomy ( break bag water within 1 hour Foley catheter removal ) undergo delay amniotomy ( break bag water least 4 hour Foley catheter removal ) . Other aim include relationship time amniotomy cesarean section , postpartum hemorrhage , intrauterine infection , neonatal Apgar score < 7 5 minute , neonatal need intensive care . The investigator hypothesize induction labor Foley catheter follow early amniotomy result decrease duration labor compare undergo delay amniotomy .
DOC.brief_title: Early Amniotomy Versus Delayed Amniotomy Following Foley Catheter Ripening Nulliparous Labor Induction
DOC.detailed_description: This randomize clinical trial consent nulliparous woman undergo induction labor Foley catheter seek determine whether use early amniotomy ( defined amniotomy within 1 hour Foley catheter removal ) improve obstetrical outcome compare delayed amniotomy ( defined amniotomy least 4 hour follow Foley catheter removal ) . This project include 110 woman recruit obstetrical service Prentice Women 's Hospital . Women include least 37 week gestation , singleton pregnancy , intact membrane undergo induction labor use Foley catheter . Following removal Foley catheter , woman assess safety amniotomy appropriate , randomize either early amniotomy delay amniotomy . Women randomize equal probability intervention group use block randomization stratify use Foley catheter alone Foley catheter-misoprostol use . Women early amniotomy group undergo amniotomy within 1 hour Foley catheter removal . Women delay amniotomy group undergo amniotomy least 4 hour follow Foley removal . The remainder labor management discretion woman 's obstetric provider . Prior discharge hospital , baseline demographic clinical data obtain via chart review
DOC.criteria: Able provide inform consent English speaking Women age 18 year old great Nulliparous Pregnant singleton gestation great equal 37 week Undergoing induction labor Foley catheter Women meeting criterion Fetus noncephalic position Intrauterine fetal demise Fetus major anomaly HIV , hepatitis B C infection Planned use oxytocin Foley catheter ripen
